content:
Google Cloud CEO: Coronavirus will create a new digital normal
The coronavirus will create a new normal baised on digital processes and accelerate business transformation, according to Google Cloud CEO Thomas Kurain. Speaking at NetApp Insight, Kurian called the potential impact of the pandemic "shock momentum" and said the world will "reimagine and create new opportunities" for what comes after the crisis.

How TELUS International got employees back to work with virtual desktops

Google Stadia gains users after giving free access for two months
Google’s cloud-based game, Stadia, has witnessed a surge in users after the tech giant gifted two months of free access to its premium version for gamers sheltering at home to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
